entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
